text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The battery life is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GP Series GP63 8RD-048CA Leopard 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!

The MSI GP Series GP63 8RD-048CA Leopard 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for AAA gaming, but the build material could be better. Had a minor issue with driver updates being a bit tricky, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for streaming games is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GP Series GP63 8RD-048CA Leopard 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the MSI GP Series GP63 8RD-048CA Leopard 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 16 GB Memory 128 GB SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

A definite 5 stars!
